#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t, a[150], sum;
    string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        for (int i=0; i<150; i++) {
            a[i] = 0;
        }
        sum = 0;
        cin>>s;
        for (int i=0; s[i] != '\0'; i++) {
            a[s[i]]++;
        }
        for (int i=0; i<150; i++) {
            int j = a[i];
            sum += j/2 + (j%2);
        }
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
}
